column1: #Text=" Jinora says : " Uhh ... " Meelo says : " There was a lemur fight , but the bison told us not to worry because a giant was coming .
#Text=Then we almost got eaten by a shark - squid !
#Text=It appears my old nemesis has found me .
#Text=" Pema says : " Jinora , were you and Meelo teasing your sister again ?
#Text=" Jinora says : " I do n't know .
#Text=" Pema says : " Honestly , I do n't know why you kids ca n't just get along !
#Text=" Tenzin says : " It 's all right , dear , Ikki could n't have gone far. , I 'll find her .
#Text=" Bumi says : " Commander Bumi reporting for duty !
#Text=Search - and - rescue missions are my specialty .
#Text=" Kya says : " What do you say we all go together ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Sure , I could use the help .
#Text=" Bumi says : " When I get back , we 'll come out with a plan to take down that shark - squid once and for all !
